explanation: [0-0] A teddy bear dog is lying in a light-colored, round dog bed, which is placed next to a shelf full of books.

[0-4] The teddy bear dog bares its teeth, a hand holding a beige envelope covers the dog's face. Then, a black pen is used to mark the position of the dog's teeth on the envelope before it is removed to reveal the white tabletop underneath.

[4-10] The marked envelope is then placed next to a mobile phone displaying a photo of the teddy bear dog. Two teeth marks are visible on the side of the phone. The phone screen then goes black, revealing that the marks match the teeth positions on the envelope. The envelope is then placed next to a yellow book with similar marks, and again the marks match the teeth positions. Finally, the envelope is held next to a tube of toothpaste, and the marks on it also match those on the envelope.
